content.p: Access the full suite of services on the Microsoft Azure platform, including virtual machines, storage, databases, and web hosting. Microsoft Azure is a cloud computing platform offering access to virtual machines, data storage and database solutions, web hosting options, containers, developer tools and more. PGRs, post-docs and research staff. Variable. Please submit a service request and ask for ‘research unmanaged’ cloud compute access. If you're struggling please get in touch with the team Submit and track requests to solve your IT issues Updates on the University's core IT services
